MAN.TITLE: line_graph
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: graph with nodes corresponding to edges

PARAM_DESCRIPTION.SP: : graph list of the old graph
: graph list of the new graph

DESCRIPTION.P: line_graph returns the graph g1 with the nodes corresponding to the edges of the graph g. g1 is defined in the following way: - its nodes correspond to the edges of g - 2 nodes of the new graph are adjacent if and only if the corresponding edges of the graph g are adjacent.
The coordinates of the nodes of g1 are given by the middle points of the corresponding edges of g.
